title: Classic crêpes suzette
description: Delia shows you how to whip up this retro classic of pancakes in a boozy orange sauce.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz milk mixed with 75ml/3fl oz water
1 small lemon, grated rind and juice
3 tbsp Grand Marnier, Cointreau or brandy
a little extra Grand Marnier, for flaming
